original_text: My friend, I pray that God will help you to live well. I know that you are well in your spirit. I pray that your body will also be well.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자여 네 영혼이 잘됨 같이 네가 범사에 잘되고 강건하기를 내가 간구하노라

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will help you
I know that you are well
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 잘 되어 있다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: I pray that your body will also be well
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 육체도 또한 잘 되기를 기도합니다
